name: Mob Boss
description:
Once upon a time before Sh?m embarked on his first ever Aus / NZ tour, an evil hacker decided to steal Sh?m's exclusive remix for Jokers track Tron & a number of other dubplates. We need you to help return these dubplates to Sh?m before he goes on tour.

REWARD! - Free download of Joker - Tron (Sh?m Remix)

Spacebar - Jump
